p:
To assess the in vivo role of HIF-1α in AEC2 during influenza virus infection, we first generated Spc-Cre +. Hif1α fl/fl mice and then established an IAV infection mouse model. Upon intranasal infection of mice with a low lethal dose of 3.5 LD50 mouse-adapted PR8 (A/PuertoRico/8/34 H1N1), Spc-Cre +.Hif1α
fl/fl mice showed increased mortality ( Figure 1(A)) and weight loss ( Figure 1(B)) compared to the PR8-infected control mice.
